name: hire_stream
description: A comprehensive job portal application structured as a monorepo, containing:

scripts.in: npm install --prefix student_portal && npm install --prefix admin_portal && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix student_portal" "npm start --prefix admin_portal" "npm start --prefix backend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix student_portal" "npm run dev --prefix admin_portal" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
